Calculate co-expression statistics

Source: R/coexpression_analysis.R
calculate_coexpression_stats.Rd

Generates comprehensive statistics for co-expression analysis results.

Usage

calculate_coexpression_stats(cor_result, include_pairwise = FALSE)

Arguments

cor_result

Result from calculate_isoform_coexpression

include_pairwise

Include pairwise correlation details

Value

A list of statistical summaries

On this page
